name: The Summit [Demo]
description:
"Sometimes it's better to run, sometimes it's better to fight, these are decisions you'll have to make sooner or later."
The Summit is a first-person horror experience that combines different mechanics for more reverse gameplay.  You're Simon Rodriguez, retired military man and amateur videoblogger, specializing in urban exploration, you get an email that will change his life completely.

With AAA next-generation graphics, set in an urban exploration with an undesirable climate. Choose to hide or fight your enemies, but you can't always choose between the two.
With polished gameplay and fully customised controls you'll be able to tackle the many challenges the story has in store for you.

Note: The demo only includes the playable prologue, however you can play it as many times as you want.
